subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fernando Verdasco reached his first final since October, beating Denis Istomin, 6-3, 2-6, 6-4, in the semifinals of the SAP Open in San Jose, Calif.
snippet: Fernando Verdasco reached his first final since October, beating Denis Istomin, 6-3, 2-6, 6-4, in the semifinals of the SAP Open in San Jose, Calif.
